text: When the news reached all the kings on the west side of the Jordan—in the hill country, the foothills, and all along the Mediterranean coast as far as Lebanon (including the Hittites, Amorites, Canaanites, Perizzites, Hivites, and Jebusites)—
they formed an alliance to fight against Joshua and Israel.
When the residents of Gibeon heard what Joshua did to Jericho and Ai,

<st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> <st data-num="06213 01571">did</st> <st data-num="06195" class="">something clever</st>. They <st data-num="01980 06737">collected</st> some <st data-num="01980 06737">provisions</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03947" class="">put</st> <st data-num="01087" class="">worn-out</st> <st data-num="08242" class="">sacks</st> on their <st data-num="02543" class="">donkeys</st>, along with <st data-num="01087" class="">worn-out</st> <st data-num="04997 03196">wineskins</st> that were <st data-num="01234" class="">ripped</st> and <st data-num="06887" class="">patched</st>.

They had <st data-num="01087" class="">worn-out</st>, <st data-num="02921" class="">patched</st> <st data-num="05275" class="">sandals</st> on their <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st> and <st data-num="05921" class="">dressed in</st> <st data-num="01087" class="">worn-out</st> <st data-num="08008" class="">clothes</st>. <st data-num="03605" class="">All</st> their <st data-num="03899 06720">bread</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="03001" class="">dry</st> and <st data-num="05350" class="">hard</st>.<n id="2" />

They <st data-num="01980" class="">came</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="04264" class="">camp</st> in <st data-num="01537" class="">Gilgal</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> him <st data-num="0413" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, “We have <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from a <st data-num="07350" class="">distant</st> <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>. <st data-num="06258 03772">Make</st> a <st data-num="01285" class="">treaty</st> with us.”

The <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="02340" class="">Hivites</st>, “<st data-num="0194" class="">Perhaps</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="07130" class="">near</st> us.<n id="1" /> So <st data-num="0349" class="">how</st> can we <st data-num="03772" class="">make</st> a <st data-num="01285" class="">treaty</st> with you?”

But they <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st>, “<st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> are willing to be your <st data-num="05650" class="">subjects</st>.”<n id="1" /> So <st data-num="03091" class="">Joshua</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> them, “<st data-num="04310" class="">Who</st> are <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="0370" class="">where</st> do you <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> from?”
They told him, “Your subjects have come from a very distant land because of the reputation of the Lord your God, for we have heard the news about all he did in Egypt

and <st data-num="03605 0834">all</st> he <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> to the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="0567" class="">Amorite</st> <st data-num="04428 0834">kings</st> on the <st data-num="05676" class="">other side</st> of the <st data-num="03383" class="">Jordan</st>—<st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05511" class="">Sihon</st> of <st data-num="02809" class="">Heshbon</st> and <st data-num="04428" class="">King</st> <st data-num="05747" class="">Og</st> of <st data-num="01316 0834">Bashan</st> in <st data-num="06252" class="">Ashtaroth</st>.

Our <st data-num="02205" class="">leaders</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> who <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> in our <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> <st data-num="0559 0413 0559">told</st> us, ‘<st data-num="03947 03027">Take</st> <st data-num="06720" class="">provisions</st> for your <st data-num="01870" class="">journey</st> and <st data-num="01980" class="">go</st> <st data-num="07125" class="">meet</st> them. <st data-num="0559 0413">Tell</st> them, “<st data-num="0587" class="">We</st> are willing to be your <st data-num="05650" class="">subjects</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06258 03772">Make</st> a <st data-num="01285" class="">treaty</st> with us.”’

<st data-num="02088" class="">This</st> <st data-num="03899" class="">bread</st> of ours was <st data-num="02525" class="">warm</st> when we <st data-num="06679" class="">packed</st> it in our <st data-num="01004" class="">homes</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> we <st data-num="03318" class="">started out</st> to <st data-num="01980 0413">meet</st> you,<n id="1" /> but <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="03001" class="">dry</st> and <st data-num="01961 05350">hard</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="0428" class="">These</st> <st data-num="04997 03196 0834">wineskins</st> we <st data-num="04390" class="">filled</st> were <st data-num="02319" class="">brand new</st>, but <st data-num="02009" class="">look</st> how they have <st data-num="01234" class="">ripped</st>. Our <st data-num="0428 08008">clothes</st> and <st data-num="05275" class="">sandals</st> have <st data-num="01086" class="">worn out</st> because it has been a <st data-num="03966" class="">very</st> <st data-num="07230" class="">long</st> <st data-num="01870" class="">journey</st>.”
The men examined some of their provisions, but they failed to ask the Lord’s advice.
Joshua made a peace treaty with them and agreed to let them live. The leaders of the community sealed it with an oath.
Three days after they made the treaty with them, the Israelites found out they were from the local area and lived nearby.

So the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="05265" class="">set out</st> and on the <st data-num="07992" class="">third</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> <st data-num="0935" class="">arrived</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> their <st data-num="05892" class="">cities</st>—<st data-num="05892 01391">Gibeon</st>, <st data-num="03716" class="">Kephirah</st>, <st data-num="0881" class="">Beeroth</st>, and <st data-num="07157" class="">Kiriath Jearim</st>.
The Israelites did not attack them because the leaders of the community had sworn an oath to them in the name of the Lord God of Israel. The whole community criticized the leaders,
but all the leaders told the whole community, “We swore an oath to them in the name of the Lord God of Israel! So now we can’t hurt them.

We <st data-num="02063 06213">must</st> let them <st data-num="02421" class="">live</st> so <st data-num="05921" class="">we</st> can <st data-num="03808 01961">escape</st> the <st data-num="07110" class="">curse</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">attached to</st> the <st data-num="07621 0834">oath</st> we <st data-num="07650" class="">swore</st> to them.”<n id="1" />
The leaders then added, “Let them live.” So they became woodcutters and water carriers for the whole community, as the leaders had decided.
Joshua summoned the Gibeonites and said to them, “Why did you trick us by saying, ‘We live far away from you,’ when you really live nearby?

<st data-num="06258" class="">Now</st> <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> are <st data-num="0779" class="">condemned</st> <st data-num="03808 03772 04480">to perpetual</st> <st data-num="05650" class="">servitude</st> as <st data-num="02404 06086">woodcutters</st> and <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="07579" class="">carriers</st> for the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of my <st data-num="0430" class="">God</st>.”<n id="1" />

They said to Joshua, “It was carefully reported to your subjects how the Lord your God commanded Moses his servant to assign you the whole land and to destroy all who live in the land from before you. Because of you we were terrified we would lose our lives, so we did this thing.

So <st data-num="06258" class="">now</st> <st data-num="02005" class="">we</st> are in your <st data-num="03027" class="">power</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="06213" class="">Do</st> to us <st data-num="05869 06213">what</st> you <st data-num="05869 06213">think</st> is <st data-num="02896" class="">good</st> and <st data-num="03477" class="">appropriate</st>.”<n id="2" />

Joshua <st data-num="06213" class="">did</st> <st data-num="03651" class="">as</st> they <st data-num="03651" class="">said</st>; he <st data-num="05337 03027">kept</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">from</st> <st data-num="02026" class="">killing</st> them<n id="1" />
and that day made them woodcutters and water carriers for the community and for the altar of the Lord at the divinely chosen site. (They continue in that capacity to this very day.)
